Room.Name: Neilian Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are looking over the cliffs, high above the Othax River.
Room.LongDescription: Neilian Drive continues to the east and west. On the north, you can peer over the cliffs, looking down into the great river Othax, although right now, there doesn't appear to be a lot of water flowing. On the south side of the road is the Temple of Ilsensine.
